src:
The best lamps for your home – in pictures

01 Nov 2019, 12:30


Quirky lamps to brighten any table




Customise your own lamp – base, shade, and cable.
Billie table lamp, £182 for the base only, laurielamps.com This article contains affiliate links, which means we may earn a small commission if a reader clicks through and makes a purchase. All our journalism is independent and is in no way influenced by any advertiser or commercial initiative. By clicking on an affiliate link, you accept that third-party cookies will be set. More information.



Grey glass table lamp, £60, laredoute.co.uk



Head of Apollo lamp with green silk shade, by Luke Edward Hall, £200, habitat.co.uk



Lottie lamp, £163, pooky.com



This site is a treasure trove of vintage lamp bases.
1970s table lamp, £40, vinterior.co



Cera mustard table lamp, £79, furniturevillage.co.uk



Black honeycomb lamp, £169, barkerandstonehouse.co.uk



Vivienne smoked glass table lamp, £125, johnlewis.com



Mulan table lamp, £119.40 for the base only, darlighting.co.uk
